recipeInstructions.text:
In a saucepan over low heat,
combine cocoa powder,
sugar, crème de cacao and
just enough half-and-half
to make a slurry. Add
milk and whisk until
blended (be careful not to
boil). Remove from heat
and add rum. To serve, put
three rum-soaked raisins in
a mug, pour in the cocoa
mixture and top with cream
that has been freshly
whipped with a little rum.
